Text: I'm sorry but this movie is utter crap! Don't download it even if you loved the game! Uwe Boll should just commit suicide! Or someone should do it to his directing career anyway! How can he still be aloud to make movies!? Sure Kristanna Loken is sexy as hell and yes there is full frontal nudity somewhere in there but even that is not enough to make this movie ecen close to bearable!
